remarks: The value of the vertex degree function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-Dec-2017.)
statement:
vdgrval $p |- ( ( ( V e. W /\ E Fn A /\ A e. X ) /\ U e. V ) -> ( ( V VDeg E ) ` U ) = ( ( # ` { x e. A | U e. ( E ` x ) } ) +e ( # ` { x e. A | ( E ` x ) = { U } } ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d E x $.
$d U x $.
$d V x $.
$d W x $.
$d X x $.
